name: Vienna Ski Weekends
description: Your guide to the best weekend ski trips from Vienna. Expert-tested ski resorts within 1-4 hours of the Austrian capital.

author.name: Alex Miller
author.bio: Based in Vienna, Alex has spent over a decade exploring Austrian ski resorts on weekends and holidays. Working in travel tech by day, Alex combines insider knowledge of the Austrian Alps with a passion for making ski trip planning simple and accessible for everyone -- from first-timers to seasoned powder chasers.
